articles.title: Google launches 'Switch to Android' app to help users easily transfer data from an iPhone - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: According to Google, the software is temporarily delisted, which means it can't be found through an Apple App Store search, but it may be downloaded via a direct link. The app also does not display in App Store search results or on Google's developer website.…

articles.title: Cyclist dies after collision with lorry at zebra crossing in Eunos - AsiaOne
articles.description: A 64-year-old cyclist was knocked down by a lorry at a zebra crossing along Jalan Eunos on Sunday (April 16). He died in hospital subsequently. In a Facebook photo shared by Jeffrey Keng on the same day, it showed a Singapore Civil Defence Force (SCDF) person…

articles.title: What Chinese scientists learnt by teaching 2 monkeys to play Pac-Man - AsiaOne
articles.description: What can scientists learn by teaching 2 monkeys to play Pac-Man? Quite a lot it seems, according to researchers at the Chinese Academy of Sciences. A team of neuroscientists from the academy said they used the classic video game to look at the way the primate…

articles.title: Mediacorp actor Benjamin Tan's mother who had been in a coma dies - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: “I hope I did you proud in this life, I’d want to be your son again in our next lives. Be happy, Mummy.”
articles.content: Mediacorp actor Benjamin Tans mother has died. He shared the news on social media on Saturday (Apr 16): I hope I did you proud in this life, Id want to be your son again in our next lives. Be happy, … [+5 chars]
